医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
镰状细胞病的新疗法在国际试验中显示出有希望的结果范德比尔特大学医学中心 (VUMC) 的研究人员正在宣传一项多中心、国际 2 期临床试验的数据，该试验显示了镰状细胞病 (SCD) 的一种新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease-shows-promising-results-in-international-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease-shows-promising-results-in-international-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1438e135-1771-4137-96eb-9aa949556bff Tue, 25 Jun 2024 21:05:38 -0400 New curative treatment for sickle cell disease shows promising results in international trial
新报告强调迫切需要针对性别的心血管研究和护理心血管疾病是女性死亡的主要原因，而女性和男性之间在护理和获取服务方面仍然存在差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-report-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-gender-specific-cardioangio-research-and-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-report-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-gender-specific-cardioangio-research-and-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af757946-031a-4fcb-bd49-4a205a54897d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:59:30 -0400 New report highlights the urgent need for gender-specific cardiovascular research and care
洛杉矶县批准居民医疗债务减免洛杉矶县监管机构周二一致投票决定购买并免除数百万美元的医疗债务，这是一项全面计划的一部分，旨在解决给近 80 万居民带来的 29 亿美元的负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Los-Angeles-County-approves-medical-debt-relief-for-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Los-Angeles-County-approves-medical-debt-relief-for-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b11406ac-ffcf-4078-bfe8-cb25c4883e5d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:53:36 -0400 Los Angeles County approves medical debt relief for residents
体力活动可显着降低老年人的全因死亡风险和心血管死亡风险体力活动可显着降低老年人，尤其是社会经济地位较低的老年人的全因死亡风险和心血管死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Physical-activity-significantly-reduces-all-cause-and-cardioangio-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Physical-activity-significantly-reduces-all-cause-and-cardioangio-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=687a72b0-77a8-4a94-ad2f-834f901ffaa7 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Physical activity significantly reduces all-cause and cardiovascular mortality risks in older adults
母乳库可改善婴儿健康，但无法完全替代母乳科学家们研究了母乳库及其对婴儿健康的影响，强调了捐赠母乳和母乳在肠道微生物群和发育方面的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Human-milk-banks-improve-infant-health-but-cant-filled-replace-mothers-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Human-milk-banks-improve-infant-health-but-cant-filled-replace-mothers-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fb722e5-0799-4fd8-ad7c-81483fbe9bca Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:18:00 -0400 Human milk banks improve infant health but can't fully replace mother's milk
空气污染对全球人口的公共卫生不利影响暴露于高水平的空气污染中会导致各种健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Adverse-public-health-effects-of-air-pollution-on-global-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Adverse-public-health-effects-of-air-pollution-on-global-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d69a202-e798-4bbb-a89d-e7491a6b5cab Tue, 25 Jun 2024 15:08:57 -0400 Adverse public health effects of air pollution on global population
世卫组织报告强调全球酒精和毒品相关死亡负担世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的一份新报告强调，每年有 260 万人因饮酒而死亡，占所有死亡人数的 4.7%，60 万人因使用精神药物而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/WHO-report-highlights-global-burden-of-alcohol-and-drug-lated-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/WHO-report-highlights-global-burden-of-alcohol-and-drug-lated-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e11f4801-7d1d-48de-b416-a3c26d0078c2 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 15:03:00 -0400 WHO report highlights global burden of alcohol and drug-related deaths
使用真实世界数据评估药物相关的肝脏毒性根据英国大学佩雷尔曼医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究，目前评估药物相关性肝损伤的方法并不能准确描述某些药物对肝脏的毒性或缺乏毒性。宾夕法尼亚州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Using-real-world-data-to-assess-medication-lated-liver-毒理学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Using-real-world-data-to-assess-medication-lated-liver-毒理学.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfb78348-0067-4892-a1dd-97624d3d2143 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:57:15 -0400 Using real-world data to assess medication-related liver toxicity
威尔康奈尔医学公司获得 150 万美元资助用于预测前列腺癌骨转移威尔康奈尔医学院获得了美国国防部前列腺癌研究计划的 150 万美元拨款，用于开发新方法，利用疾病早期采集的肿瘤样本来预测前列腺癌男性的癌细胞扩散到骨骼的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-2415M-grant-to-predict-prostate-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-receives-2415M-grant-to-predict-prostate-cancer-bone-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac4ad24f-8c9a-49c1-a5dc-67e446e5bd6d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:50:13 -0400 Weill Cornell Medicine receives $1.5M grant to predict prostate cancer bone metastasis
新的光检测方法改进了食品污染物的筛查有时，食品会因某种污染而被召回。对于此类产品的消费者来说，召回可能会引发对其饮食安全性和可靠性的怀疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-light-based-detection-method-improves-screening-for-food-contaminants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-light-based-detection-method-improves-screening-for-food-contaminants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d115d7ef-37ea-4c1e-80b7-c9aeb2b57783 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 14:21:00 -0400 New light-based detection method improves screening for food contaminants
